title: What can i do for summer holidays in pesu if i have low cgpa?
content:
I have low cgpa so they wont select me for internships. What can i do to upskill myself or spend time here constructivly. 

4th sem student

comments.body:
Do the same thing high cgpa people do. 

But do it now. 

Study
i guess he meant upskill , as per the post context
Many research centres don't have cgpa cutoff as selection criteria
